# Forums

Questions about HADES can be asked on the [OHDSI Forums](http://forums.ohdsi.org/).

# Bug reports

Bug reports should be files using the issue tracker of the misbehaving package:

- [CohortMethod issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/CohortMethod/issues)

- [SelfControlledCaseSeries issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/SelfControlledCaseSeries/issues)

- [SelfControlledCohort issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/SelfControlledCohort/issues)

- [CaseControl issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/CaseControl/issues)

- [CaseCrossover issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/CaseCrossover/issues)

- [PatientLevelPrediction issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/PatientLevelPrediction/issues)

- [EmpiricalCalibration issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/EmpiricalCalibration/issues)

- [MethodEvaluation issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/MethodEvaluation/issues)

- [Cyclops issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/Cyclops/issues)

- [DatabaseConnector issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/DatabaseConnector/issues)

- [SqlRender issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/SqlRender/issues)

- [ParallelLogger issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/ParallelLogger/issues)

- [FeatureExtraction issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/FeatureExtraction/issues)

- [Andromeda issue tracker](https://github.com/OHDSI/Andromeda/issues)
